MS MCQs

    Create a web app that uses data to make decisions on the basketball court

    »

    1. What type of machine learning model is effective for predicting one value based on many other values?

      Decision tree

      Principal component analysis, or PCA

      K-means

      Linear regression


    2. What is one way to create randomized sample data that is close to accurate?

      Use a random number within the standard deviation of input values for a machine learning algorithm.

      Use random.randrange, with the smallest and largest number of input values.

      It’s never useful to create randomized sample data.

      Any integer between 0 and 100.


    3. Static web apps in Azure take significant expertise to develop and deploy.

      True - Static web apps in Azure typically are used by web developers with decades of experience.

      True - Static web apps in Azure are only for expert Flask developers.

      False - Static web apps in Azure have many entry points and can be novice-friendly.

      False - Static web apps in Azure are only for learners who are just starting out.
